home.title: The spot for the Dutch parkour / freerunning scene
home.subtitle: Everything you need to be part of and stay up to date with the Dutch parkour and freerunning community.
home.whatsappDescription: The Dutch parkour and freerunning community is mainly active on WhatsApp. Join the community, so you can easily find people to session with.
home.aboutDescription: The goal of pkfr.nl is to have all useful information about freerunning and parkour in one place. Here you'll find overviews of the best spots, open gyms and community links.

spots.title: Spots
spots.description: Finding parkour spots can take time, unless you already know where they are! Here you'll find apps, maps and lists that are great for spots in the Netherlands. Looking for something indoors? Try the Gym Finder.
spots.parkourSpotDescription: Parkour.Spot is the ultimate community-powered spot collection — 28,000+ locations synced with public maps, and recovered from legacy sources. Spots can be categorized and rated. Open-source, constantly growing, and built by Ward Weistra — absolute fucking legend.
spots.spotMapsDescription: Excellent parkour spot maps from Dutch freerunners. These maps help you quickly find local spots and are ideal for anyone looking for new training locations. Do you have a spot map of your region? Feel free to share it using the button below!
spots.indoorSpotsDescription: The weather isn't always nice, and covered spots are scarce! Training indoors is really nice then. Use the Gym Finder to find the nearest freerun gyms.
spots.cityLegendsDescription:
CityLegends is a somewhat decent app for finding spots. At the spots you can watch or upload clips. You can battle others with your clips, sometimes even win prizes!
Read more about the app here.

jams.heading: Jams & events
jams.intro: Jams are an important part of the freerun community. They are where you meet new people, train together and learn from each other. Below you'll find an overview of upcoming jams and events in the Netherlands.
jams.upcomingSubtitle: Jams & Events from the Dutch Freerun Community
jams.submitDescription: Are you organizing a jam? Or is an event missing from the calendar? Share it with the rest of the community!
jams.notificationsDescription: Do you want to be notified via WhatsApp about freerun jams and events in the Netherlands?
jams.europeDescription: Nice that you want to be involved with the international community! Check this calendar maintained by MATTTMA, with jams across Europe.

openGyms.heading: Open Gyms
openGyms.intro: At an open gym you can train at your favorite indoor freerun gym without a membership. There are locations across the country, but note: you sometimes need to register.
openGyms.finder: Curious how a gym looks or which ones are near you? Check the Gym Finder.

filter.noResultsFound: No maps found that match your search criteria.

forms.success: Thanks! Your input has been received.
forms.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

gym.infoPlaceholder: Short description, prices, facilities and where people can find more info...
gym.messagePlaceholder: Any changes, special notes or extra information...

site.title: pkfr.nl
site.description: The spot for the Dutch parkour & freerunning community.

links.heading: Community Links
links.heroDescription: Useful links for the Dutch parkour community.
links.parkourcultureWebsite: Parkourculture website (for classes, workshops and kids parties in and around Utrecht)

tools.heading: Tools
tools.heroDescription: Useful tools for the Dutch parkour community.

jumpflix.name: JUMPFLIX
jumpflix.description: Discover parkour movies, documentaries and playlists.

distanceConverter.name: Distance Analyzer 5000™
distanceConverter.description: Make jumps fair by compensating for shoe size differences.

spotMapFinder.name: Spot Map Finder
spotMapFinder.description: Find and filter maps with freerun spots in the Netherlands and beyond.
spotMapFinder.heading: Spot Map Finder
spotMapFinder.intro:
Quickly find lists and maps of parkour spots. These can range from popular locations to hidden non-spot gems.
Search and filter maps for the Netherlands and beyond. You can search by name, author, or filter by country.
spotMapFinder.addMapDescription: Do you have a great list or map you'd like to share with the community? Drop a link and we'll add it as soon as possible!

gymFinder.name: Freerun Gym Finder
gymFinder.description: Quickly find the nearest indoor freerun gym in your area.
gymFinder.heading: Gym Finder
gymFinder.intro: Here you'll find {count} indoor freerun gyms in the Netherlands! You can view all gyms on a map or browse them individually below.
gymFinder.permissionTitle: Allow pkfr.nl to access your location.
gymFinder.permissionDescription: Share your location so the list can be sorted by distance.

distanceConverter.name: Distance Analyzer 5000™
distanceConverter.intro:
For ages traceurs struggled with a fundamental problem..
Thanks to this revolutionary technology you can effortlessly convert jump distances to the only correct unit: your shoe size.
Fill in, and measure ONCE!
